signature: void putAll(Map<? extends K, ? extends V>)

enhanced_by.reason: The put method modifies the map state, which is similar to the putAll method.
Clearing the map before invoking putAll can help isolate the effect of the putAll operation.
The size method can be used to verify the number of entries in the map after putAll is called.
The containsKey method can be used to verify that specific keys have been added to the map after putAll.
